sqlMap.select: /* ID : recInfo.getRecLogCount */ select count(*) cnt FROM tb_rec_reclog tb_reclog left outer join ( select user_id, user_name worker_name from tb_mng_userinfo where tenant_id = #tenantId# and user_id like CONCAT('%', #findWorkerId#, '%') and user_name like CONCAT('%', #findWorkerNm#, '%') ) tb_user_work on tb_reclog.worker_id = tb_user_work.user_id left outer join ( select user_id, user_name from tb_mng_userinfo where tenant_id = #tenantId# and user_id like CONCAT('%', #findUserId#, '%') and user_name like CONCAT('%', #findUserNm#, '%') ) tb_user on tb_reclog.user_id = tb_user.user_id left outer join tb_rec_file tb_rec on tb_reclog.rec_key = tb_rec.rec_key where tb_reclog.tenant_id = #tenantId# and DATE_FORMAT(work_sdate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') >= CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(#txtDate1_From#,'%Y%m%d'),'%Y-%m-%d'), ' ' , DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(#recFrmTm#,'%H%i%s'),'%H:%i:%s')) and DATE_FORMAT(work_sdate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') <= CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(#txtDate1_To#,'%Y%m%d'),'%Y-%m-%d'), ' ' , DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(#recEndTm#,'%H%i%s'),'%H:%i:%s')) and realtime_flag = #findRealtimeFlag#

/* ID : recInfo.getRecLogList */ select * from ( select Row_Number() over (order by work_sdate) RowNum2, TB_IN.* from( select Row_Number() over (order by work_sdate desc) RowNum1 , tb_reclog.tenant_id, DATE_FORMAT(work_sdate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as work_sdate , realtime_flag, worker_id, worker_name, tb_reclog.rec_key, tb_rec.rec_time , IFNULL(tb_rec.end_time, 0) end_time , tb_reclog.user_id, user_name, tb_reclog.dn_no, worker_ip,tb_rec.cust_name , tb_rec.cust_tel, tb_rec.call_id, tb_reclog.rec_reason, tb_reclog.rec_reason_text FROM tb_rec_reclog tb_reclog left outer join ( select user_id, user_name worker_name from tb_mng_userinfo where tenant_id = #tenantId# and user_id like CONCAT('%', #findWorkerId#, '%') and user_name like CONCAT('%', #findWorkerNm#, '%') ) tb_user_work on tb_reclog.worker_id = tb_user_work.user_id left outer join ( select user_id, user_name from tb_mng_userinfo where tenant_id = #tenantId# and user_id like CONCAT('%', #findUserId#, '%') and user_name like CONCAT('%', #findUserNm#, '%') ) tb_user on tb_reclog.user_id = tb_user.user_id left outer join tb_rec_file tb_rec on tb_reclog.rec_key = tb_rec.rec_key where tb_reclog.tenant_id = #tenantId# and DATE_FORMAT(work_sdate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') >= CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(#txtDate1_From#,'%Y%m%d'),'%Y-%m-%d'), ' ' , DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(#recFrmTm#,'%H%i%s'),'%H:%i:%s')) and DATE_FORMAT(work_sdate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') <= CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(#txtDate1_To#,'%Y%m%d'),'%Y-%m-%d'), ' ' , DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(#recEndTm#,'%H%i%s'),'%H:%i:%s')) and realtime_flag = #findRealtimeFlag# ) TB_IN WHERE RowNum1 <= #iEPageNo# ) TB_OUT WHERE RowNum2 <= #iSPageNo# order by work_sdate desc
sqlMap.insert: /* ID : recInfo.setRecLogInsert */ insert into tb_rec_reclog ( tenant_id, worker_id, listening_key, work_sdate, worker_ip, user_id, dn_no, user_ip, realtime_flag, rec_key ) values ( NULLIF(#tenantId#, ''), NULLIF(#workerId#, ''), NULLIF(#listeningKey#, ''), SYSDATE(), NULLIF(#workerIp#, ''), NULLIF(#userId#, ''), NULLIF(#dnNo#, ''), NULL, NULLIF(#realtimeFlag#, ''), NULLIF(#recKey#, '') )

/* ID : recInfo.setAppRecLogRealInsert */ insert into tb_rec_reclog (tenant_id, worker_id, listening_key, work_sdate, worker_ip, user_id, dn_no, user_ip, realtime_flag, rec_key , rec_reason , rec_reason_text , rec_time ) select #tenantId# , #workerId#, #listeningKey#, sysdate(), #loginIp# , user_id , dn_no , phone_ip , #realtimeFlag#, rec_key , #recReason# , #recReasonText# , rec_time from tb_rec_file where call_id = #callId# and rec_time = (select max(rec_time) from tb_rec_file where call_id = #callId# )
